title: Arcane Trickster
content:
Gate 3. Arcane Tricksters primary ability is Dexterity, their saving throw proficiencies are Dexterity & Intelligence and they have a Hit Dice of 1d8. They have proficiency with Simple weapons, hand crossbows, longswords, rapiers, shortswords and with Light Armour.

Arcane Tricksters are rogues with a clever touch of magic, using illusions and enchantments to keep their opponents on the backfoot.

BG3 Arcane Trickster Class Features

Arcane Trickster Spellcasting

Third Spellcasters: Gains spell
